concept.title: Setting up a TURN server
concept.shortdesc: A TURN server can be configured to provide for efficient traffic flow within your Sametime meeting.

conbody.p:
You'll need to install a TURN server and configure it for use with the Sametime Meeting server. There are several options for a TURN server. One option is the Coturn, which is an open source TURN server. The following two methods can be used to install the Coturn TURN server:
Install on Ubuntu operating system
Install on CentOS
